Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1968...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 3/2/1968 (Going to PIT: C D. Pick. Going to HOU: CF G. Maddox)...
Injured on 6/9/1968 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1972, off Billy Farmer (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/3/1972, off Sandy Koufax (PHI)...
Injured on 5/16/1973 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 10 weeks...
Injured on 8/2/1976 with a Fractured Hip, out for 10 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (N) on 4/18/1977...
Injured on 6/3/1977 with a Broken Hand, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Injured on 8/3/1982 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 8 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 8/24/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/21/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $2,900,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/18/1986, off Don Aase (STL)...
Injured on 5/7/1986 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Chicago (N) on 6/2/1986...
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1987...
